org.openpnp.machine.reference.driver

Class SerialPortCommunications

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openpnp.machine.reference.driver.SerialPortCommunications
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReferenceDriverCommunications

    public class SerialPortCommunications
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReferenceDriverCommunications
    A class for SerialPort Communications. Includes functions for connecting, disconnecting, reading and sending lines.

      • readLine

        public java.lang.String readLine()
                          throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                                 java.io.IOException
        Read a line from the serial port. Blocks for the default timeout. If the read times out a TimeoutException is thrown. Any other failure to read results in an IOExeption;
        Specified by:
